<<<<<<< HEAD
The vvoman learning in silence: or, The mysterie of the womans subiection to her husband· As also, the daughter prophesying, wherein the Lord hath, and is fulfilling that he spake by the prophet Joel, I will poure out my spirit upon all flesh, &c. / Given forth by George Fox. Fox, George, 1624-1691.
[2], 6 p.
Printed for Thomas Simonds, at the sign of the Bul and Mouth neer Aldersgate., London, : 1656.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March: 22 1655"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through and replaced with a "5". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Fox, George, 1624-1691.
[2], 6 p.
Printed for Thomas Simonds, at the sign of the Bul and Mouth neer Aldersgate., London, : 1656.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March: 22 1655"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through and replaced with a "5". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
